Zeke Wattles Info

Indeterminacy

Interactive poster-creation experience with a dot matrix printer.
INSTRUCTORS: BRAD BARTLETT, MILES MAZZIE, IVAN CRUZ
MEDIA: PRINT, INTERACTIVE INSTALLATION, WEB
COLLABORATOR: ALI TORBATI / YEAR: 2018

Design as Performance

Indeterminacy is an approach to composing, pioneered by John Cage, in which some aspects of a work are left open to chance or to the interpreterâ€™s free choice. Proposed as part of a Dublab event series based on the idea of chance in music and design, an interactive microsite allows users to generate their own posters and output them in real time via a hacked dot matrix printer.

Create your own poster
